titles.title: Military Service Academy Foundation Act of 2022
Military Service Academy Foundation Act of 2022
To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the unreimbursed use, by a foundation that supports a military service academy, of facilities or equipment of such military service academy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Service Academy Foundation Act of 2022
This bill provides that the U.S. Military Academy, U.S. Naval Academy, and U.S. Air Force Academy may authorize a charitable, educational, or civic nonprofit organization that operates exclusively to support the service academy to use the facilities or equipment of the academy on an unreimbursed basis, with specified limitations.
